00011 #include <dual-pob.h>

00013 #define EEPROM_ADDR     0xA0
00014 
00015 UInt8 GetByteFromI2cEeprom(UInt16 address)
00016 {
00017         UInt8 tmp;
00018 
00019         SendSlaveAddress(EEPROM_ADDR);                  //Send the Eeprom Adress
00020         WriteOnI2C((UInt8)((address&0xff00)>>8));       //Send Addr H
00021         WriteOnI2C((UInt8)address&0x00ff);                      //Send Addr L   
00022         STOPI2C();
00023 
00024         SendSlaveAddress(EEPROM_ADDR|1);                
00025         tmp=ReadOnI2CNoAck();
00026         STOPI2C();
00027 
00028         return tmp;
00029 }
00030 
00031 void SetByteToI2cEeprom(UInt16 address,UInt8 data)
00032 {       
00033         SendSlaveAddress(EEPROM_ADDR);                  //Send the Eeprom Adress        
00034         WriteOnI2C((UInt8)((address&0xff00)>>8));       //Send Addr H
00035         WriteOnI2C((UInt8)address&0x00ff);                      //Send Addr L
00036         WriteOnI2C(data);                                               //Send Data 
00037         STOPI2C();
00038 }

00040 int main(void)
00041 {
00042         Int8 string[2];
00043         UInt8 data;
00044 
00045         //init uart0 at 19200 bauds
00046         InitUART0(19200);
00047 
00048         //init i2c
00049         InitI2C();
00050 
00051         SetByteToI2cEeprom(0x0000,0xAA);
00052         data = GetByteFromI2cEeprom(0x0000);
00053 
00054         Bin2Hex(data,string);
00055         SendBufferToUART0(string,2);
00056 
00057         while(1)
00058         {
00059         }
00060 
00061         return 0;
